original_text: Make him stand before Eleazar the priest and all the congregation, and you shall commission him in their sight.
korean_text: 그를 제사장 엘르아살과 온 회중 앞에 세우고 그들의 목전에서 그에게 위탁하여

sentences.original_text: Make him stand before Eleazar the priest and all the congregation,
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 제사장 엘르아살과 온 회중 앞에 세우고,

sentences.original_text: and you shall commission him in their sight.
